vote.title: To Honor and Recognize Michael S. Brown for his Loyal Dedication to Public Service and Commitment to the Betterment of Columbus
vote.description:
Title
 
To Honor and Recognize Michael S. Brown for his Loyal Dedication to Public Service and Commitment to the Betterment of Columbus
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Michael S. Brown has led a uniquely impactful and impressive career, leaving a legacy of service and dedication for the time he has given to the City of Columbus; and
 
WHEREAS, Michael has served as the Chief of Staff to Columbus City Council for nearly six years, leveraging his unparalleled ability to communicate across barriers, aptitude for navigating complex issues in the legislative arena, and knack for consensus-building, honed during his time in the Coleman Administration, to continuously deliver on the City’s priorities and needs; and
WHEREAS, for over two decades, Michael’s career has been rooted in stewardship, actively enriching and participating in a wide variety of non-profit organizations, boards, and commissions relating to fostering the arts, economic development, and transit advocacy, among many others; and
WHEREAS, Michael was instrumental in the development of Columbus as a cultural hub, securing long-term funding for the Greater Columbus Arts Council and sitting on countless boards and commissions, such as the Jazz Arts Group Board of Directors, the Founding board of Cartoon Crossroads Columbus, and the Columbus Film and Music Commissions, among many others; and
WHEREAS, for eight years, Michael’s innovative leadership as Vice President of Strategic Development at Experience Columbus, combined with his work on various non-profit boards, helped revitalize Downtown Columbus, securing countless community development projects and critical civic and private investment opportunities, transforming Columbus into the economic powerhouse it is today; and
WHEREAS, Michael’s tireless advocacy for the residents of Columbus, publicly and behind-the-scenes, has proven an invaluable asset in steering Columbus towards a more vibrant future, the City of Columbus extends its deepest gratitude and respect to Michael; now, therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby honor and recognize Michael S. Brown for his loyal dedication to public service and commitment to the betterment of Columbus.
